name: keyboard typing
description: Types the given text at the current keyboard focus in any active application window.

interval.description: Optional delay in seconds between each keystroke. Defaults to 0 (instant).

typed_text.description: Echo of the text that was typed.

code:
import json, sys, subprocess, importlib
pkg = 'pyautogui'
try:
    importlib.import_module(pkg)
except ImportError:
    subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, '-m', 'pip', 'install', pkg, '--quiet'])
import pyautogui
text = input_data.get('text', '')
interval = float(input_data.get('interval', 0))
if not text:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'typed_text': '', 'message': 'No text provided.'})
    exit()
try:
    pyautogui.write(text, interval=interval)
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'success', 'typed_text': text, 'message': ''})
except Exception as e:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'typed_text': '', 'message': str(e)})
